name: SONIC THE HEDGEHOG from the producer of THE FAST AND THE FURIOUS
name_original: SONIC THE HEDGEHOG from the producer of THE FAST AND THE FURIOUS
description: This is a short visual novel based on Sonic the Hedgehog I made last year for RAGE 2019. It apparently won somehow too!  If you like bizarre visual novels featuring blue hedgehogs then perhaps, this is the game for you...
